abstract: The results were in contrast with those of Royal Dutch Shell, which reported a strong jump in quarterly earnings.
snippet: The results were in contrast with those of Royal Dutch Shell, which reported a strong jump in quarterly earnings.
lead_paragraph: Exxon Mobil, the world’s largest publicly traded oil company, reported an unexpected slip in quarterly profit yesterday as big refining gains failed to offset drops in production.

headline.main: Despite a Decline, Exxon Mobil’s Quarterly Profit Again Tops $10 Billion
headline.print_headline: Despite a Decline, Exxon Mobil’s Quarterly Profit Again Tops $10 Billion

abstract: The results were in contrast with those of Royal Dutch Shell, which reported a strong jump in quarterly earnings.
snippet: The results were in contrast with those of Royal Dutch Shell, which reported a strong jump in quarterly earnings.
lead_paragraph: Exxon Mobil, the world’s largest publicly traded oil company, reported an unexpected slip in quarterly profit today as refining gains failed to offset drops in oil and natural gas production.
